naslov: Najam, kuća, Zagreb, Podsljeme, Šestine, 310 m2 (iznajmljivanje)
opis: Namještena luksuzna 5-sobna kuća ( 310 m2 ) na tri etaže, Šestine. Građena na parceli od 1300 m2 s uređenim vrtom s automatskim navodnjavanjem i vanjskim grijanim bazenom ( 8 x 4 m ) . SUTEREN ( 89 m2 ); namješten studio apartman, kotlovnica za toplinsku pumpu i bazen. PRIZEMLJE; ( 124 m2 ); ulazni prostor, dnevni boravak s izlazom na terasu ( 12 m2 ), blagovaonica, kuhinja, garderoba, toalet. KAT ( 96 m2 ); hodnik,  četiri spavaće sobe, dvije kupaonice, garderoba. Kuća ima protuprovalna vrata, alarm, video portafon, klima uređaj u svakoj prostoriji, električne rolete, kamin, hrastov parket, centralni usisivač, omekšivač vode. Grijanje je plinsko, preko dizalice topline i podno grijanje. Kući pripada više parkirnih mjesta, dva natkrivena. Nalazi se u Podsljemenskoj zoni s pogledom na okolne brežuljke, udaljena desetak minuta vožnje autom do centra grada. Agencijska provizija za najmoprimca: JEDNA MJESEČNA NAJAMNINA (oslobođena PDV-a) Furnished luxury 5-room house (310 m2) on three floors, Šestine. Built on a plot of 1300 m2 with a landscaped garden with automatic irrigation and an outdoor heated pool (8 x 4 m). BASEMENT (89 m2); furnished studio apartment, boiler room for heat pump and swimming pool. GROUND FLOOR (124 m2); entrance area, living room with exit to the terrace (12 m2), dining room, kitchen, wardrobe, toilet. FLOOR (96 m2); hallway, four bedrooms, two bathrooms, wardrobe. The house has security door, alarm, video intercom, air conditioning in every room, electric shutters, fireplace, oak parquet, central vacuum cleaner, water softener, gas heating, a heat pump and underfloor heating. The house has several parking spaces, two covered. Ten minutes by car from the city center. Agency commission for the lessee: ONE MONT RENT (no VAT)
